name: @iguhealth/hl7.fhir.r4.core
title: Hl7 Core resources
description: IGUHEALTH package that contains core hl7 R4 resources.
author: IGUHealth

scripts.generate-index: yarn node ../../packages/cli/lib/iguhealth.js generate index-file -p . -r r4 --ignore r4/hl7/profiles-others.json r4/hl7/dataelements.json r4/hl7/extension-definitions.json
